comment: WV -Police arrested Juan Carlos DeLeon Zanas, , attempted to abduct a -year-old girl.A Kroger employee said multiple bystanders stopped him
amr:
# ::snt WV -Police arrested Juan Carlos DeLeon Zanas, , attempted to abduct a -year-old girl.A Kroger employee said multiple bystanders stopped him
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / arrest-01
            :ARG0 (p / police)
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Juan"
                        :op2 "Carlos"
                        :op3 "DeLeon"
                        :op4 "Zanas"))
            :ARG2 (a2 / attempt-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (a3 / abduct-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (g / girl
                              :age (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (y / year)))))
            :location (s / state
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "WV")))
      :snt2 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :ARG1-of (e / employ-01
                        :ARG0 (c / company
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Kroger"))))
            :ARG1 (s3 / stop-01
                  :ARG0 (b / bystander
                        :quant (m2 / multiple))
                  :ARG1 p2)))

comment: Use of the slur here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults Mexicans.
amr:
# ::snt Use of the slur here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults Mexicans.
(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (a / accept-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (s / slur)
                  :location (h / here))
            :prep-in (d / discourse-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / demean-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Mexico"))))
                  :op2 (ii / insult-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 p2))))

comment: Please do not use derogatory ethnic slurs.
amr:
# ::snt Please do not use derogatory ethnic slurs.
(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (s / slur
            :mod (e / ethnic)
            :mod (d / derogatory)))

comment: Using racial slurs speaks volumes about one's character.
amr:

(s / speak-01
      :ARG0 (u / use-01

                  :mod (r / race)))
      :ARG1 (c / character
            :poss (o / one))
      :quant (v / volume))
